MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DD6 postcode area of Wormit. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.00AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to repair a broken piece of equipment on our overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11.00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10.07AM on 24 October 2020.
